content.full_text:
Petition of James Wright to the Sangamon County Commissioners’ Court, 1 James Wrighthereby applies to thecounty commissioners, courtofSangamon countyfor a Writ ofadquoddamnum2to erect a mill dam on Brush creek on the South West quarter of Section number 18.

Township 14 North of Range 4 West and the South East quarter of Section 13 in Township

14 North of Range 5 West, or either of them3
paragraphs: Petition of James Wright to the Sangamon County Commissioners’ Court, 1 James Wrighthereby applies to thecounty commissioners, courtofSangamon countyfor a Writ ofadquoddamnum2to erect a mill dam on Brush creek on the South West quarter of Section number 18.
Township 14 North of Range 4 West and the South East quarter of Section 13 in Township
14 North of Range 5 West, or either of them3
citations: Henry C. Black,Black’s Law Dictionary, 6th ed. (St. Paul, MN: West, 1990), 50.

Check of James Wright to Stuart & Lincoln;Lincoln wrote petition for Wright, Martha L. Benner and Cullom Davis et al., eds.,The Law Practice of Abraham Lincoln: Complete Documentary Edition, 2d edition (Springfield: Illinois Historic Preservation Agency, 2009),http://www.lawpracticeofabrahamlincoln.org/Details.aspx?case=141198; “Counties, Townships, and Ranges in Illinois,” Maps,  Martha L. Benner and Cullom
                     Davis et al., eds.,The Law Practice of Abraham Lincoln: Complete Documentary Edition,http://www.lawpracticeofabrahamlincoln.org/Reference.aspx?ref=Reference html files/LandMeasurement.html.

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the text of the petition in its entirety.

2To assess what damage a specific act, if done, would tend to have to other people's
                  interests.Henry C. Black,Black’s Law Dictionary, 6th ed. (St. Paul, MN: West, 1990), 50.

3Area located southeast ofSpringfieldon the border of Ball and Cotton Hill townships.Wright gaveStuart & Lincolna letter of credit for $5 drawn onRobert Allenfor their legal services in drawing up this petition.Check of James Wright to Stuart & Lincoln;Lincoln wrote petition for Wright, Martha L. Benner and Cullom Davis et al., eds.,The Law Practice of Abraham Lincoln: Complete Documentary Edition, 2d edition (Springfield: Illinois Historic Preservation Agency, 2009),http://www.lawpracticeofabrahamlincoln.org/Details.aspx?case=141198; “Counties, Townships, and Ranges in Illinois,” Maps,  Martha L. Benner and Cullom
                     Davis et al., eds.,The Law Practice of Abraham Lincoln: Complete Documentary Edition,http://www.lawpracticeofabrahamlincoln.org/Reference.aspx?ref=Reference html files/LandMeasurement.html.

structured_content.text: Petition of James Wright to the Sangamon County Commissioners’ Court, [March 1838]1

James Wrighthereby applies to thecounty commissioners,  courtofSangamon countyfor a Writ ofadquoddamnum2to erect a mill dam on Brush creek on the South West quarter of Section number 18.
               Township 14 North of Range 4 West and the South East quarter of Section 13 in Township
               14 North of Range 5 West, or either of them3
